name: Last Christmas...
description:
A project for a programming exercise. The theme was Evil Santa and I had roughly 2 weeks to make it. 

WASD to move

Space to dash 

Keep your combo and make the best score in the limited ammount of time that you have. Enjoy ! 

This game includes a karaoke, perfect for party with friends and family !

(I dont own any of the sounds or art in this game, I just put all this together with a little bit of code)
